name: Kernel Bay
description:
KERNEL BAY

mountains crumble into sand
shells and pebbles ground down
weight of the world in your hand
just waiting for you to build castles

take a scoop fill up on sand melt it down
then blow
then blow life into it

bulbous baubles, vases and beads
catch your eye, catch your needs

glass of colors, shape and size
catch your eyes, catch the sunrise

mountains crumble people stumble and go
where they can be anyone
anyone’s guest

jpojecp · Anyone’s Guest (KYWO)
